item.title: Bagaimana Awal Mulanya Lorem Ipsum?
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">What is Lorem Ipsum? Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry’s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

item.title: Cara Membaca Kode Nomor Binari
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">Binary is the language of computers. They allow computers to do all of the complex things that they do. You might think that since binary numbers allow for such complex operations that they would be equally complex to decode, but thankfully this is not the case. We will show you how to decode binary numbers into alphabetical or numerical characters. Binary systems predating Leibniz also existed in the ancient world. The aforementioned I Ching that Leibniz encountered dates from the 9th century BC in China. The residents of the island of Mangareva in French Polynesia were using a hybrid binary-decimal system before 1450.

item.title: Planet Venus di Tata Surya
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap mt-n1">Venusian surface was a subject of speculation until some of its secrets were revealed by planetary science in the 20th century. Venera landers in 1975 and 1982 returned images of a surface covered in sediment and relatively angular rocks.

item.title: Dasar Penggunaan Zoom
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap">What you should learn on basic as Zoom newbie? You will find the information online easily type the keywords “how to use zoom” using search engine as well as the official Zoom FAQ and documentation itself. Learning focus are key basics on creating, accessing, and using your Zoom account practical, specific instructions on using Zoom on both Mac and PC Easy-to-follow steps to join and create meetings Interactive instructions on testing audio, video, and using Zoomâ€™s chat function How to avoid the most common mistakes people make using Zoom Advanced skills with virtual backgrounds, adding icon-based reactions to meetings, and different ways to view meeting members All the skills you need to feel effective and comfortable on Zoom, whether during work or social calls.
